message: Let's split it evenly to start, no need to negotiate too hard
I'll give you a decent amount, but I'm not going to give you more than 40%
I'm not taking 40%. That's not nearly enough for me.
You're getting greedy, Bob. I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm taking the majority
I'll give you a small amount, but I'm taking the majority this time
No way, Bob. I'm not letting you take 70% of the money.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve more than 30% of the money
I'm not budging on the majority, but I'll give you a small consolation prize
No way, Bob. I'm not accepting 20% of the money. You're not budging, I won't either.
I'm getting close to my target, but I'm willing to give you a bit more to get this deal done
I'm getting impatient, take it or leave it
Are you kidding me? 10% of the money? No way, Bob. I'm not accepting that insult.
I'm not going to let you take all the money, Bob. I'm making one last serious offer
I'm not going to give you a single dollar more, take it or leave it
Are you out of your mind, Bob? 50000 dollars? I'm not accepting that joke.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it. I'm not making another move.
You're not getting a penny more, it's all mine now
You're not getting away with this, Bob. I'd rather take nothing than accept that laughable offer.
